text: Odile Saugues (born 26 January 1943) was a member of the National Assembly of France. She represented Puy-de-Dôme's 1st constituency in the Puy-de-Dôme department, from 1997 to 2017 as a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Odile Saugues
